mapper.sql: id, music_name, music_type, music_belongTo, music_context, music_createTime, music_createUser, ATTRA, ATTRB, ATTRC, ATTRD, ATTRE, ATTRF, ATTRG
mapper.select: select id, music_name from music_table where music_name like concat('%',concat(#{searchName},'%'))
SELECT mt.music_name music_name, mtc.music_down_address music_down_address FROM music_table mt, music_table_count mtc WHERE mt.id = mtc.music_id AND mtc.id = #{mtcId}

SELECT
music_like_count
music_hite_count
music_play_count
FROM music_table_count WHERE id = #{mtcId}
SELECT music_play_count, music_like_count, music_hite_count FROM music_table_count WHERE id = #{mtcId}

SELECT mt.id id, mtc.id mtcId, mt.music_name music_name, mt.music_belongTo music_belongTo, mt.music_context music_context, mt.music_photo_url music_photo_url, mt.music_type music_type, mtc.music_address music_address, mtc.music_down_address music_down_address, mtc.music_hite_count music_hite_count, mtc.music_like_count music_like_count, mtc.music_order music_order, mtc.music_play_count music_play_count FROM music_table mt, music_table_count mtc WHERE mt.id = mtc.music_id AND mt.id = #{id}
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into music_table (music_name, music_type, music_belongTo, music_context, music_createTime, music_createUser, ATTRA, ATTRB, ATTRC, ATTRD, ATTRE, ATTRF, ATTRG) values (#{musicName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{musicType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{musicBelongto,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{musicContext,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{musicCreatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{musicCreateuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attra,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attrb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attrc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attrd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attre,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attrf,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attrg,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update music_table
music_name = #{musicName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
music_type = #{musicType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
music_belongTo = #{musicBelongto,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
music_context = #{musicContext,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
music_createTime = #{musicCreatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
music_createUser = #{musicCreateuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRA = #{attra,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRB = #{attrb,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRC = #{attrc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRD = #{attrd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRE = #{attre,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRF = #{attrf,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRG = #{attrg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update music_table set music_name = #{musicName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, music_type = #{musicType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, music_belongTo = #{musicBelongto,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, music_context = #{musicContext,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, music_createTime = #{musicCreatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, music_createUser = #{musicCreateuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRA = #{attra,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRB = #{attrb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRC = #{attrc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRD = #{attrd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRE = #{attre,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRF = #{attrf,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRG = #{attrg,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
